code: import React from"react";import ProductCard from"./ProductCard";import"./ProductGrid.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FavouriteGrid=_ref=>{let{gridLoading,products=[]}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-grid ".concat(gridLoading?'grid-loading':''),children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",onClick:e=>{window.location.href=product.product_link;},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.thumbnail,alt:product.title,style:{height:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",style:{background:"linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), rgb(0 0 0 / 0%)), url(".concat(product.imageUrls['800x800'],")"),filter:'blur(36px)',backgroundSize:'1px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{fontWeight:400},children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",product.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content-desc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"price-range",children:product.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cta-wishlist price-range cta-shop",style:{background:'#000'},onClick:()=>{window.location.href=product.product_link;},children:"Shop Now"})]})]}))});};export{FavouriteGrid};
